rules: Use TypeScript and Next.js App Router
Follow the folder structure exactly. Do not create extra top-level folders
Centralize all data access in /lib/storage.ts (abstract localStorage or Supabase)
UI components must be presentational. Pages wire the components with data
Use Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui for styling
Use react-hook-form + zod for form validation
Do not hardcode secrets; use environment variables only
Functions must be small, reusable, and documented
